section_text: 1 In the Schedule— a Part 1 creates a statutory entitlement to parental bereavement leave, b Part 2 creates a statutory entitlement to parental bereavement pay, and c Part 3 contains related amendments.

2 1 An amendment or repeal made by the Schedule has the same extent as the provision to which it relates. 2 Section 1 and the Schedule come into force on such day as the Secretary of State may by regulations made by statutory instrument appoint; and different days may be appointed for different purposes. 3 This section comes into force on the day on which this Act is passed. 4 This Act may be cited as the Parental Bereavement (Leave and Pay) Act 2018.
